articles.author: Marco Marcelline
articles.title: Google to Ban Financial Lending Apps From Accessing User Photos, Contacts - PCMag
articles.description: The move is a bid to stop predatory loan apps from harassing and intimidating borrowers into paying outstanding debts, which often come with huge interest rates.
